EmailTemplate.subject: MBO Partners Information (1313177763.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
110 Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Thomas,
It was a pleasure speaking with you. I’ve enclosed a few things as summary to our call:
Link to our benefits: http://www.mbopartners.com/mbo-exec-group-benefitsLink to a summary of the value of using MBO Partners: http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/Welcome_to_MBO_Partners.pdfLink to the most common types of non-billable expenses you can submit to us: http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Partners_Expense_List.pdfOur Full Expense Policy: http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Partners_Expense_Policy.pdf I will follow up with you as a courtesy, but feel free to email or call me should you have any questions,
Regards,
Steve ___________________________________ Steve Arhancet Director, Enrollments and Market Development MBO Partners
t: 703.793.6011 f: 703.793.6081 m: 540.560.8837 e: sarhancet@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com
Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files.
